r.s: PHP 5.4 Compatibility Coding Standard for PHP_CodeSniffer
r.d: This is a set of sniffs for PHP_CodeSniffer that checks for PHP 5.4 compatibility.
r.n: PHP 5.4 Compatibility sniffs based on Wim Godden's PHP53Compatibility code sniffs. See [blog](http://techblog.wimgodden.be/tag/codesniffer) and [github](https://github.com/wimg/PHP53Compat_CodeSniffer).
